channel.title: Adding models/ints
channel.description: A lot of custom items that i try to add, when you spawn them your client freezes. I've got no idea why because A lot of items I add work fine.. but some just make the client freeze.. does anyone know why it does this

item.title: Adding models/ints
item.dc:creator: @O_G_aka_DaLe ØϺĞ™ âķâ ĐãĽè
